Articles.Content: The issue begins when I load into the runway or launch pad and I can not press the A button on my xbox one controller to launch my stages.I do not know what causes this glitch but it happens 1/3 of the times I go to launch anything and gets very annoying since I have to completely restart my game just to fix it.I am really hoping this gets fixed very soon because I love ksp but when I can not launch my stages it gets very annoying.
